description: The Men's Hiking Marty Short-Sleeve T-Shirt pairs easy comfort with performance and style that does more. Post-consumer materials are recycled into Marmot UpCycle® quick-drying polyester and then blended with certified organic cotton. Its crew-neck style is easy to layer, and the front graphic features our namesake.
name: Marmot Hiking Marty Tee SS - Mens
